DOC.brief_title: HKT-500 Adult Patients With Shoulder Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter study men woman 18 year age great acute shoulder pain require analgesic treatment daily least 2 week .
DOC.criteria: The subject unilateral acute shoulder pain . The subject woman childbearing potential positive urine pregnancy test , lactating , surgically sterile ( tubal ligation hysterectomy ) , least 2 year postmenopausal , practice acceptable form birth control ( define use intrauterine device spermicide , barrier method spermicide , condom spermicide , subdermal implant , oral contraceptive , abstinence ) least 2 month prior Visit 1 .
